movie.title: Devil's Knot
movie.plot: The savage murders of three young children sparks a controversial trial of three teenagers accused of killing the kids as part of a satanic ritual.

events.title: Jessie Misskelley is convicted of murder
Chris Morgan and Brian Holland are convicted of murder
